title: Can you help me identify this font!!!!
content:
Can you help me identify this font. Thanks!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820182910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screenshot_6_6_13_9_21_PM_5672.jpg)
author: matthewmartin711

comments.content: Type ID board is over that way \>\>\>

I would say it is Britannic Bold:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820182910/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/")
